info.name: Laravel Doctrine JSON:API Skeleton API Documentation

query.description:
Sparse fieldsets - specify which fields to include in the response for each resource type. ([Spec](https://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-sparse-fieldsets))

**Available fields:** `name`, `permissions`
Page number. ([Spec](https://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-pagination))
Number of results per page. ([Spec](https://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-pagination))

Sort the results by attributes. Prefix with `-` for descending order. ([Spec](https://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-sorting))

**Available sort fields:** `name`, `permissions`
